attributes.action: make it law that all local authorities in England and Wales permanently hold details of any criminal convictions held by private hire taxi drivers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These records should be made available for public access as presently some local authorities do not keep such records after a liscence is issued.
Fredom of information requests have been denied by many local authorities after a campaign to expose the danger of known criminals working as private hire vehicle drivers and being allowed access to vunerable adults and children. 
Local authorities make a lot of money from issuing liscences to taxi drivers, this practise should be monitored to prevent abuse and negligence in screening who is issued a liscence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
